---
category: news
title: "DXC appoints ex-PwC partner Kylie Watson to head up A/NZ security"
excerpt: "DXC Technology has appointed ex-PwC partner Kylie Watson to head up security for Australia and New Zealand (A/NZ). Watson will be based in Canberra and responsible for assisting DXC customers enhance their cyber security standings and protect them from attacks through advisory and managed security services."
